Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Halobacterium salinarum NRC817, Halobacterium GRB and Haloferax gibbonsii.
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Miscellaneous: Halocin-S8 is quite robust, as it can be desalted, boiled, subjected to organic solvents, and stored at 4 degrees Celsius for extended periods without losing activity.

Literature.Title: Halocin S8 a 36-amino-acid microhalocin from the haloarchaeal strain S8a.
Literature.Author: Price LB, Shand RF.

Literature.Title: Halocin S8: a 36-amino-acid microhalocin from the haloarchaeal strain S8a.
Literature.Author: Shand R.F.,Price L.B.
